page.title: 04The Reepham Spectacular.
page.content: The Reepham Spectacular is held in the summer every year. When Mrs. Steward, used to live at Rookery Farm she let the organisers use her meadows. A band could parade around in them. Most people in Reepham attend the Spectacular.It is a family day out.There are raffles,tractor displays ,roundabouts,and sometimes a traction engine and a threshing machine. Sometimes there is a bouncy castle. Now it is held in Reepham Market Place.Lot's of different stalls are there, including stalls held by different clubs and groups.The stalls were made up of different things.This year, there was a stall held by the Reepham R.A.T.S. On it,they had things made of wool,and clothes.They also had a 'kill the rat' competition. There were also sweets,cakes,and games stalls.
